page.title: 12GORDON RUSSELL LTD.BROADWAY.
page.content: Gordon Russell Ltd. is a seventy years old company making{cabinet furniture to the highest standards of design and production from the best materials available, mainly timber, in solid and veneer. The furniture consists of a stock range, semi-stock range (standard design but made according to the clients' individual needs in terms of choice of timber and size) and entirely custom-made items. It caters for areas in banks, offices, hotels etc. where furniture of a prestigious nature is required. 200 people of a high calibre are employed in the offices and workshops and the company trains its own apprentices to become skilled craftsmen. They export worldwide but the main export markets are in America and the Middle East.The company also offers a complete interior design service.
